bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding documents of the Legislature.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to revise certain provisions regarding documents of the Legislature. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 2-7-4 be REPEALED. 2-7-4. Prefiling of bills and resolutions with Legislative Research Council--Rules for handling. Section 2. That § 2-7-5 be REPEALED. 2-7-5. Numbering, printing and disposition of prefiled bills--Date of introduction. Section 3. That § 2-7-6.1 be AMENDED: 2-7-6.1. Committee introduction of requested bills and resolutions. No bill or joint resolution may be introduced in either house of the Legislature by any committee thereof, except: (1) A bill or a joint resolution introduced by any standing committee of either house; (2) A bill or joint resolution referred to the Legislature from an interim committee of the State Legislative Research Council; (3) A bill or joint resolution introduced at the request of the interim Rules Review Committee, the interim Government Operations and Audit Committee, the interim Retirement Laws Committee, the interim Joint Bonding Review Committee, and the interim State-Tribal Relations Committee by one or more committee members upon majority vote of the interim committee; or (4) A bill or joint resolution may be introduced by any committee of either house of the Legislature at the request of the Governor, an executive agency or of the chief justice of the Supreme Court. The committee shall obtain must receive a written request for such the introduction from either the council, the Governor, the department head of an executive agency, a constitutional officer or board, or the chief justice, and shall retain such the request in its file. Committee bills Bills introduced on behalf of a department head of an executive agency, a constitutional officer or board under this section may be introduced by the chairman of the committee without a vote of the committee for purposes of prefiling. Nothing in this section prohibits one or more legislators from introduction of a bill or a joint resolution. Section 4. That § 2-7-7 be REPEALED. 2-7-7. Officers to keep legislative journals--Custody and disposition of bills and documents. Section 5. That § 2-7-10 be REPEALED. 2-7-10. Permanent journals as official record of proceedings. Section 6. That § 2-7-18 be REPEALED. 2-7-18. Engrossment of bills and amendments. Section 7. That § 2-7-19 be REPEALED. 2-7-19. Enrollment of bill after passage by both houses. Section 8. That § 2-16-10.2 be REPEALED. 2-16-10.2. South Dakota Codified Laws provided to Legislature--Codified Laws and Administrative Rules provided to legislators.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
